column1: The '''Sea of Núrnen''' also known as '''Lake Nurnen''' was an inland sea in [[Mordor]].
The lake was fed by all four (unnamed) major water courses that traversed most of Mordor
It held bitter water not suitable for drinking
column4: was fertile enough (watered by a river system coming from the [[Ephel Dúath]]) to feed the entire armies of [[Sauron]].
